name: Mahjong Yuuenchi
overview: In Mahjong Yūenchi, the player is taken to an amusement park, assuming the role of the park's mascot, Junkie the Peacock. The goal of the game is rather simple: spot young and pretty girls among the visitors of the park, and beat them in a mahjong game. The gameplay consists of clicking on various locations in the park, locating the girls, choosing to play mahjong with them, and unlocking new pictures and locations following the victory. The game contains scenes with nudity and explicit sexual scenes.
